channel.title: Precursor
channel.description: has anyone here tried the mod Precursor? I thought it kicked butt.

item.title: Precursor
item.dc:creator: HawkeyE
item.description:
I think the puzzles could have been a bit more complex, at least from the perspective of someone that has played other Half-Life games. I got past all of them pretty quickly. Map design, music and overall feel I also enjoyed, though I don’t think they took full advantage of the engine’s graphics. I also thought the voice-acting was awesome. The beginning scene was pretty cool. Forced me to play differently, as I normally like to loiter, explore every crevice and break everything that is breakable, but you were forced to keep running (which is more realistic).

Read full topic

item.title: Precursor
item.dc:creator: Karriz
item.description:
It was really fun, but short. Not much gameplay elements but map design, music and feeling was great.
